ja405:6.1: Appañhi etaṃ → appañca hetaṃ (s2, s3) | appaṃsi etaṃ (mr)
ja405:6.3: sahassāni → sahassānaṃ (bj, pts1 ^sn6.4#1 [4. Bakabrahmasutta]) | sahassāna (s2, s3, km)
ja405:11.2: Sambuddhimantaṃ → sambuddhivantaṃ (s2, s3, pts1) | sambuddhavantaṃ (mr), vatinaṃ → vati taṃ (s2) | vatitaṃ (s3) | vatidaṃ (mr)
